oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Southern Cross of Honor medal
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Medal awarded to veterans by the United Daughters of the Confederacy (UDC). The item belonged to James Mason Jewell, who was in Co. E, 26th Tenn Inf. Regt., CSA. His future wife, Mary Ann McDonald, worked with Rhea County women during the war. See also the article on Rhea County women during the Civil War in the Chattanooga Times, "Rhea County Girls formed Confederate Unit," from Sunday, February 4, 1934.
